articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Mozambican President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Mozambican President
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Armando Emilio Guebuza, president of the Republic of Mozambique.
					 The gift was conveyed to DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong who is heading the DPRK government delegation on a visit to Mozambique by Antonio Inacio Junior, Mozambican ambassador to the DPRK, on June 13.

articles.title: Secretary General of Mozambican Political Party Meets DPRK Government Delegation
articles.content:
Secretary General of Mozambican Political Party Meets DPRK Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The secretary general of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party had a talk with the DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on a visit to Mozambique on June 12.
					 Present there were the Mozambican ambassador to the DPRK, officials concerned and the DPRK ambassador to Mozambique.
					
					 The secretary general noted that the stand of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party and the Mozambican people positively supporting the Korean people in their efforts for the peaceful reunification of the country remains unchanged, saying that the friendly relations between the two countries have a long history.
					
					 He affirmed that he would make positive efforts to steadily strengthen the tradition of solidarity, cooperation and friendship between the two countries true to the intention of Samora Moises Machel, former president of Mozambique, and the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Appeal to All Koreans at Home and Abroad Made Public
articles.content:
Appeal to All Koreans at Home and Abroad Made Public
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The North Side, South Side and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public an appeal to all Koreans at home and abroad on June 15, the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The joint declaration is a monumental document that enshrines the target, great principle and ways of national reunification which were agreed upon by all Koreans, and the nation's supreme programme for reunification.
					
					 As the June 15 era was ushered in, Koreans who suffered pain of division were united as one, pooling their efforts and sharing warm kinship and there took place multifaceted visits, contacts, joint gatherings and cooperation undertakings of people of all social standings, the appeal said.
					
					 For the past six years, however, there has continued such abnormal situation in which the joint declaration was openly denied due to the anti-reunification forces, the appeal noted, and went on:
					
					 Military tensions have escalated and all undertakings for national reconciliation, unity and co-prosperity were suspended by the forces standing against the joint declaration.
					
					 To preserve and implement the joint declaration is the only way of removing the danger of a war and paving the new way of reconciliation, cooperation, peace and reunification.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should pool their efforts and open another June 15 era of reunification without fail.
					
					 The North Side, South Side and Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration will discharge their responsibility and role as the nationwide organizations for the reunification movement in order to make this year, in which falls the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation, a year of an epochal turn for opening the second June 15 era.
					
					 The appeal called upon all the Koreans to devote all their wisdom and efforts to ushering in the second June 15 era with warm patriotism, burning will for reunification and conviction of victory.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of June 15 Joint Declaration Observed
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- There took place a joint meeting of social organizations here on Monday to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Present there were leading officials and members of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, National Peace Committee of Korea, Afro-Asian Solidarity Committee of Korea, Democratic Lawyers Association of Korea, Korean Anti-War Physicians and various other social organizations, Pyongyangites and guests of honor.
					
					 At the meeting Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the National Peace Committee of Korea who was elected its chairwoman, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the June 15 joint declaration is a great programme for reunification common to the nation which was agreed upon at a north-south summit, the first of its kind in history, and a treasure of national historic significance as it should be carried forward and implemented without fail no matter how often a regime is replaced by another.
					
					 After the publication of the declaration a new era of reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south was ushered in and historic events took place, bringing bright hope for reunification to all Koreans who had been forced to suffer pain resulting from the national division for over half a century, they said, adding:
					
					 Such a reality clearly proved the validity and vitality of the declaration.
					
					 However, after the anti-DPRK conservative forces came to power again in south Korea, the north-south relations were brought back to the era of confrontation and hostility. Notably, the Park Geun Hye regime is behaving so foolishly as to peddle such anti-reunification watchwords as "confidence-building process on the Korean peninsula" and "Dresden declaration" in breach of the declaration and get the international recognition of them.
					
					 This is nothing but an anti-reunification act of pursuing the "unification by absorption" under the "liberal democracy" and inciting the confrontation of the social systems in the north and the south in total denial of the idea of By Our Nation Itself, the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, and the proposal for reunification by federal formula.
					
					 The Park group put up the showy slogan of "confidence" outwardly but, in actuality, has desperately kicked up the confrontation of the social systems. This is little short of declaring a war against the DPRK as it is a blatant challenge to the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The reunification of the north and the south by federal formula provides a way of ensuring durable peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia but "unification by absorption" will only bring a war to the peninsula. This is the truth recognized not only by all Koreans but also by their neighboring countries and the rest of the world.
					
					 The "Dresden declaration" and the "great opportunity for unification" touted by Park in the final analysis fully revealed before the world that the "confidence-building process on the Korean peninsula" claimed by her is no more than a process for the confrontation of the social systems in the north and the south.
					
					 Those countries which are concerned for the Korean issue and support and welcome the June 15 joint declaration should see through the anti-peace nature of Park's "confidence-building process on the Korean peninsula" which diametrically runs counter to the declaration.   They should be well aware of the fact that if they stir up the process for the confrontation of the social systems against their will or not, failing to maintain a fair and discreet attitude toward the north-south relations, the ensuing catastrophic consequences would not be limited to the Korean peninsula only.
					
					 The reporter and speakers called on the  progressive personages who love justice and peace, international democratic organizations and peace-loving people in the world to heighten vigilance against the anti-reunification acts of the Park group, resolutely reject and denounce it and extend support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause of achieving reunification by federal formula based on the June 15 joint declaration and ensuring peace and stability on the peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The meeting also discussed the issues of boosting the interaction among the social organizations as required by the prevailing situation and conducting vigorous activities to disclose the anti-reunification moves of the Park group and achieve peace and stability on the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot Who Ushered in June 15 Era of Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Peerless Patriot Who Ushered in June 15 Era of Reunification
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- 14 years have passed since the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration.
					 The north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of national division was held and the June 15 joint declaration with By Our Nation Itself as a core was published in June, Juche 89 (2000), a great event which brought a new historic change in carrying out the cause of fellow countrymen for independent reunification.
					
					 After the publication of the joint declaration leader Kim Jong Il specified the orientation and ways of implementing it and promoted the great unity of the nation with his noble virtues.
					
					 He sent delegates and delegations of the DPRK side to the south side several times and took positive measures to successfully settle the issues arising in improving the inter-Korean relations and implementing the joint declaration.
					
					 He provided the north-south summit again and the Declaration for the Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity in Pyongyang in October, 2007, solemnly declaring at home and abroad once again the nationwide will to fully apply the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 He met with delegations, personages and compatriots of south Korea visiting Pyongyang after the historic June summit and led them to take the road of patriotism, unity and reunification.
					
					 He, possessed of warm humanity and compatriotic feelings, sent Songi mushrooms of world famous Mt. Chilbo and Mt. Myohyang to officials and delegates of the ruling and opposition political parties of the south side who visited Pyongyang, making them feel the kinship of northerners and national flavor.
					
					 He was the lodestar of national reunification who led the struggle of Koreans for national unity and reunification to the road of victory and glory, and the pioneer and leader of the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 His patriotic will and desire are being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Group of School Youth and Children for Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Group of School Youth and Children for Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The group of school youth and children from across the country to make the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu visited leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp on Sunday. 
					 The members of the group laid a floral basket and flowers before the mosaic depicting the peerless great persons in the secret camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in front of the birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 The letter was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The participants in the letter made a report on successfully making the study tour of revolutionary battle sites on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the victory in the battles in Musan area commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They said that they had good understanding of the revolutionary cause of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il during the study tour and were convinced once again that to carry on the march that started from Mt. Paektu to the last under the leadership of Kim Jong Un is the road of eternal victory.
					
					 The members of the group pledged to work hard to build a thriving socialist nation on this land without fail in the indomitable fighting spirit, saying that the youth who inherited the spirit of defending the leader unto death displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners will accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun that pioneered on Mt. Paektu by carrying forward the traditions of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 After the meeting the members of the group looked round the historic relics preserved with care in Kim Jong Il's birthplace.
					
					 They watched the sunrise from Mt. Paektu at the dawn of the same day.
					
					 On the top of Mt. Paektu 2 000 members of the group sang together "I Will Carry on the March Started from Mt. Paektu" reflecting the faith and will of the young vanguard to glorify the revolutionary exploits of the peerless great men for all ages and carry forward the lineage of Juche generation after generation.

articles.title: Papers Call for Meeting Challenges of Anti-Reunification Forces under Banner of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Papers Call for Meeting Challenges of Anti-Reunification Forces under Banner of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Papers here Sunday dedicate editorials to the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. There took place here the north-south summit in June, Juche 89 (2000), the first of its kind in the history of national division, and the historic June 15 joint declaration was adopted there, a special event of great significance in accomplishing the cause of independent reunification of the Korean nation, say the editorials.
					 The adoption of the joint declaration brought the dawn of the stirring June 15 era of reunification to this land over which the curtain of confrontation heavily hung, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Signal successes have been made in the north-south relations that were unimaginable in the past, Koreans demonstrated to the world its oneness and the October 4 declaration was adopted to lay a firm foundation for independent reunification, peace and prosperity. These are all associated with the meaningful June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The Korean nation's struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration accompanied fierce confrontation with anti-reunification forces.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities have gone desperate in their moves to realize the criminal ambition for unification of social systems by depending on foreign forces and escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north, quite contrary to the joint declarations just as the Lee Myung Bak regime brought back the era of confrontation by totally negating the above-said declarations.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification was full of joy for reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification, but cold air of mistrust and confrontation, tensions and dark clouds of war are now hanging over this land. This eloquently proves the validity of the said declarations and the inevitability of their implementation.
					
					 The requirements of the times and desire of Koreans can never be a plaything of traitors to the nation who stand against reunification. With nothing can they block the trend of the history toward independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 All the Koreans should pool their efforts and deal a heavy blow at the anti-reunification forces.
					
					 Minju Joson says that it is the steadfast and principled stand of the DPRK government to join hands with those who support the June 15 joint declaration and struggle for its implementation in the road for reunification and patriotism.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever join hands with those who support the inter-Korean declarations and fight for national reunification under the banner of unity, not questioning their past, irrespective of their political view, religious belief and ism.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Filled with Human Scum
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Filled with Human Scum
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Sycophantic and treacherous nature of those who were nominated as prime minister and defense minister of south Korea are being disclosed one after another, sparking off a great furor.
					 KBS on June 11 laid bare the traitorous colors of a candidate for prime minister. It said in a special lecture in 2011 he let loose sophism that the military occupation of Korea by the Japanese imperialists and the June 25 war were the "will of the God".
					
					 He also justified the division of the north and the south, claiming that if the Korean peninsula had achieved full independence, it could have been communized. He unhesitatingly made reckless remarks of belittling the national identity and insulting the uprising of Jeju islanders as a riot.
					
					 Han Min Gu who was nominated as minister of Defense is a descendant of a pro-Japanese traitor, according to a scholar of south Korea.
					
					 Han's grandfather Han Pong Su was a turncoat who capitulated to the Japanese imperialists and laid information against a chief of volunteers' army. He actively assisted the police to finding out and arresting the chief.
					
					 But Park Chung-hee military dictator put forward him as a man who fought for independence, saying that he took part in March 1 movement, thus covering up his pro-Japanese acts.
					
					 The "yusin" descendent is now thinking of consolidating the foundation of her fascist dictatorial rule by investing the descendent of the traitor with authority.
					
					 Those nominated by Park Geun Hye are all human scum keen on acts of sycophancy and treachery and frantic confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff how will the political situation of south Korea develop once they take office. 
					
					 The Park group would be well advised to bear in mind that its despicable acts will precipitate its ruin.

articles.title: Action for Wage Hike Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Wage Hike Declared in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference in Seoul on June 10 at which it declared to turn out in the action for wage hike.
					 It deplored that workers' wage is so paltry that they hardly eke out their livelihood though they do backbreaking labor and many of them can not receive even it.
					
					 It accused Park Geun Hye of negating on her commitment to wage hike made in the past "presidential" election.
					
					 It said that it would fight to build the society which respects the life of human beings more than money and profits, the world in which all workers are respected.
					
					 The present action is the one against inequality and wide gap between the rich and the poor which are rampant in society, it noted, calling on all workers to turn out in the action.
					
					 It said that organizations under the confederation would conduct information activities and hold meetings for wage hike every day and intensify the action in solidarity with civic and social organizations.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Pretending Ignorance of GIs' Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Pretending Ignorance of GIs' Crimes
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- An editorial was posted on the south Korean internet paper Voice of People on June 12 after the lapse of 12 years since two schoolgirls were mercilessly killed by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					 The editorial recalled that brutes affiliated to an engineering unit of the U.S. Second Division in south Korea drove an armored car over two schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son who were passing by on June 13, 2002.
					
					 However, the GI criminals were declared not guilty, the editorial said, adding:
					
					 12 years have passed since then but GIs' crimes are unabated in south Korea.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that as long as GIs are lording it over south Korea as occupation troops and the SOFA remains unrevised, GIs will continue to perpetrate crimes.
					
					 Security has become a hot topic in the wake of the ferry Sewol disaster. 
					
					 The political camp including the "government" vies with each other, crying out for security.
					
					 But south Korea fails to investigate or punish the GI criminals even though more than 300 crimes are committed by them every year and south Korea suffers the ensuing damage. 
					
					 To talk about security while not punishing GI criminals is just hypocrisy.
					
					 The south Korean "government" is not qualified to talk about the security of the people as it fails to revise the SOFA which patronizes GIs crimes while reading the U.S. face.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Call for Turning Out in Nationwide Movement for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Call for Turning Out in Nationwide Movement for Reunification
 Tokyo, June 13 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and other Koreans from all walks of life in Japan posted articles on websites ardently calling for turning out in a nationwide movement for reunification on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 So Chung On, director of the International Affairs and Reunification Department of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, noted that all Koreans hope for the reunification of the country, earnestly longing for the June 15 era of reunification. The only way for the Korean nation to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity is the one indicated by the June 15 joint declaration and the one of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 An Pyong Ok, vice-chairperson of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, called for dealing a sledge-hammer blow of justice at the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea by the concerted efforts of all women in the north, the south and abroad.
					
					 Ri Han Su, permanent adviser to the above-said association, underlined the need to put an end to the pain resulting from the division of the country, saying he would make every possible effort to usher in the second June 15 era of reunification in order to hand down the reunified motherland to the posterity.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said that the Korean youth and students in Japan will become pioneers of the era, pillars of a reunified country and vanguard of struggle and thus take the lead in the movement for solidarity and alliance for ushering in the second June 15 era.
					
					 Yun Pyok Am, vice-chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, called on all Koreans to get united under the banner of By Our Nation Itself by pooling all their wisdom and efforts and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification as early as possible.
					
					 Kwak Tong Ui, chairperson of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, said the only way for warming up the frozen north-south relations and paving the way of peace and reunification is to implement the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Kwak called on all overseas Koreans earnestly hoping for national reunification to turn out in the efforts to open up the second June 15 era.
					
					 Son Hyong Gun, chairman of the Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, said it is necessary to preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in order to tide over the present difficulties facing the north-south relations.
					
					 Kim Ji Yong, chairwoman of the south Korean Democratic Women's Association in Japan, said the June 15 joint declaration indicated the way for overcoming the painful situation where the Korean nation remains divided, adding the way is to independently settle the reunification issue in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Romanian Newspaper
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was carried by the June issue of the Romanian newspaper Romania Muncitoare.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the idea that it is the fundamental principle to be maintained in accomplishing the socialist cause to preserve the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction and clarifies the tasks and ways for doing it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 7 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 From the first days when he started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK, he formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and transformed the whole society as required by Kimilsungism.
					
					 He was a revolutionary comrade-in-arm who remained most loyal to the President. He assisted the President in his leadership over the party, state and army with loyalty.
					
					 After the President suddenly passed away, Kim Jong Il inherited and developed the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by the President, thus comprehensively establishing the Songun politics, a new political mode.
					
					 The DPRK could smash the imperialists' pressure and war provocations against it and become a legitimate satellite manufacturing and launching state and a nuclear weapons state under his leadership.
					
					 He wisely led the struggle for achieving the national reunification and thus provided two north-south summits and made sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, were adopted.
					
					 The Korean people are significantly marking the historic June 19, the day when Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee of the WPK to add shine to his great exploits for all ages.
					
					 His undying feats will shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Figures
						
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A lecture was held in Kyrgyzstan, a seminar in Slovakia and round-table talks in Ethiopia on June 4 and 9.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee brought about a decisive turn in strengthening the WPK.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an invincible party whose all members are united on the basis of the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and an experienced and tested guiding force.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il was a peerless elder statesman and benevolent father of the people who led socialist Korea to victory by dint of the Juche idea.
					
					 The chairman of the Slovak Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung praised the DPRK's Songun politics as the most advantageous political mode in the world, adding the DPRK is invincible thanks to it.
					
					 The director of an Ethiopian hospital said that Kim Jong Il glorified the dignity of the people and laid a solid foundation for the country's prosperity while leading the WPK for a long period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Photo exhibitions were held in Russia and Nigeria, an opening ceremony of a book, photo and art exhibition in Mexico and a book and photo exhibition in Malaysia between June 2 and 8.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works and other books, photos introducing the proud successes registered by the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation and art pieces associated with the talents of the Korean people.
					
					 A. I. Donchenko, chairman of the Russian Blagobeshensk Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said that the Korean people are performing eye-opening miracles and innovations in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The department director of the Art and Cultural Council of the Ministry of Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria said that Kim Jong Il applied the most original political mode, stressing his politics of love and trust gripped the hearts of all people.
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, noted that Kim Jong Il developed the DPRK into an invincible socialist fortress by smashing every move of the U.S. imperialists to put political and military pressure on the DPRK and apply economic sanctions against it.
					
					 The president of the Malaysian MB Tourist Company stressed that Kim Jong Il defended the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK by leading its army and people when it underwent the most harsh trials and difficulties.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in Iran, Indonesia, Malaysia and Nigeria between June 3 and 5 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Films shown included Korean film "Pyongyang Today."
					
					 After watching the film, the director of an Iranian diamond company said that Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power which no formidable enemy dares provoke by pursuing the unique Songun politics.
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company noted that he came to know better about the personality of the DPRK's leaders as the great men through his visit to the International Friendship Exhibition House where treasures of eternal value praising the sun are on display.
					
					 The director of a Malaysian company praised Kim Jong Il as the great politician who built the WPK to be a powerful party.
					
					 A department director of the Ministry of Education in Yobe State, Nigeria said that he keenly felt again the leadership ability of Kim Jong Il, seeing the DPRK rising up as a socialist fortress unfazed by the moves of the imperialist allied forces who have gone to extremes to stifle it.
					
					 The director of the agriculture department of the Ministry of Agriculture in Yobe State, Nigeria noted that the demand and interests of the people served as the standard and starting point of Kim Jong Il's all thoughts and practices and to realize them was the most important work for him that can never be compromised.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Favored by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on June 5 on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The joint declaration serves as a landmark of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of Korean division, was held in Pyongyang and the joint declaration adopted in June, 2000 thanks to warm patriotism of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The joint declaration opened a historic June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 In the June 15 era of reunification the north-south relations turned into those of reconciliation and cooperation from those of confrontation and mistrust.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations were pushed to a catastrophe by the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye puppet groups of south Korea which totally denied the joint declaration but the movement of Korea's reunification will as ever dynamically advance in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The wild ambition for "unification by absorption" by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors can never be realized.
					
					 The Songun politics formulated by HE Kim Jong Il and being carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un serves as an ever-victorious treasured sword for defending the peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics Korea will be surely reunified under the banner of the joint declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Denying June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Denying June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 15 (KCNA) -- Igor Jurisic, chairman of the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, issued a statement on June 10 on the occasion of the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 He said that the north-south summit, the first of its kind in the history of Korean division, was held in Pyongyang in June, 2000 and the joint declaration on achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country was adopted there.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Eye-opening events unimaginable in the past took place in the relations of the north and the south of Korea after the publication of the joint declaration.
					
					 The October 4 Declaration, the programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was published in 2007, opening a brighter prospect for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The June 15 era of reunification which had steadily advanced faced the grave challenge of the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea.
					
					 The present north-south relations are being deteriorated by the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea.
					
					 The peaceful reunification can be achieved only when the June 15 joint declaration is preserved and implemented.
					
					 The denial of the joint declaration will trigger off only confrontation and war.
					
					 The Park's group should lend its ears to the voices of not only all Koreans but humankind calling for respecting and thoroughly implementing the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Tiene lugar reunion conjunta de entidades socials
articles.content:
Tiene lugar reunion conjunta de entidades sociales 
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 14o aniversario de la publicacion de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, tuvo lugar el dia 14 en esta capital la reunion conjunta de las entidades sociales con la participacion de los funcionarios directivos y miembros del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos del Mundo, el Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz, el Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con los Pueblos de Asia y Africa, la Asociacion de Juristas Democraticos de Corea y otras entidades sociales, los capitalinos y los huespedes honorarios. 
					En la ocasion la presidenta del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz, Kim Jong Suk, electa como titular de la reunion conjunta, presento el informe y hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron unanimemente que la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio es el programa de reunificacion comun de la nacion, aprobado por primera vez en la Cumbre Norte-Sur y es el patrimonio nacional a ser continuado y ejecutado aunque se sustituyan los poderes. 
					
					Recordaron que despues de publicada dicha Declaracion, se abrio una nueva era de reconciliacion y cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas y ocurrieron los acontecimientos historicos que infundieron la radiante perspectiva de reunificacion a toda la nacion coreana que sufre por la division nacional de mas de medio siglo, lo cual comprobo la justeza y la vitalidad de la Declaracion Conjunta. 
					
					Sin embargo, despues de la toma del poder surcoreano por las fuerzas conservadoras anti-RPDC, las relaciones intercoreanas retrocedieron a la confrontacion y discordia, dijeron y revelaron que la camarilla de Park Geun-hye actua absurdamente para obtener el reconocimiento internacional abogando por el "proceso de confianza de la Peninsula Coreana" y la "declaracion de Dresden", despreciando la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio. 
					
					Criticaron que el proceder anti-reunificacion de Park niega totalmente el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", espiritu principal de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, y el proyecto de reunificacion segun el sistema federal, e inculca el enfrentamiento de regimenes entre ambas partes coreanas persiguiendo la "unificacion mediante la absorbicion" ateniendose al "sistema liberal y democratico".
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye preconiza la "confianza", pero, de hecho, persigue la confrontacion de regimenes, lo que significa el desafio frontal a la Declaracion Conjunta y la declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC, revelaron. 
					
					Subrayaron que la reunificacion mediante el sistema federal garantiza la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico, pero la otra mediante la absorbicion trae la guerra.
					
					Prosiguieron que esto es la verdad reconocida por toda la nacion coreana, los paises vecinos y todo el mundo.
					
					Destacaron que Park Geun-hye aboga por la supuesta "declaracion de Dresden" y la doctrina de "Thong-il Taebak" (cajon de tesoros para la unificacion), revelando asi que el "proceso de confianza de la Peninsula Coreana" preconizado por ella es el proceso de confrontacion de regimenes entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Anadieron que los paises interesados en el problema de Corea y los que aplauden la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, deben saber al dedillo la esencia anti-paz del "proceso de confianza" de Park que contraviene a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					Igualmente tendran que conocer bien que las consecuencias catastroficas que se emanen del caso de incitar, aunque sea voluntario o involuntario, el proceso de confrontacion de regimenes de la banda de Park sin mantener la actitud imparcial y prudente en el trato de las relaciones intercoreanas, nunca se limitaran solo a la Peninsula Coreana, apuntaron.
					
					Exhortaron a las personalidades progresistas del mundo amantes de la justicia y la paz, a las entidades democraticas internacionales y a los pueblos pacifistas a elevar la vigilancia sobre las maniobras anti-reunificacion de la horda de Park y rechazarlas rotundamente, asi como enviar el apoyo y solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo coreano que lucha por lograr la reunificacion de sistema federal basada en la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y alcanzar la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatica.
					
					En la reunion conjunta se debatieron los temas practicos para fortalecer mas los lazos mutuos entre las entidades sociales conforme a la demanda de la situacion dada y dinamizar las actividades para revelar y condenar las maniobras anti-reunificacion de la banda de Park y lograr la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio publica llamamiento a todos compatriotas
articles.content:
Comite Conjunto Nacional del 15 de Junio publica llamamiento a todos compatriotas
Pyongyang, 15 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 14o aniversario de publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio, el Comite Norteno, el Sureno y el Ultramarino para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio publicaron el dia 15 un llamamiento enviado a toda la nacion coreana dentro y fuera del pais.
					La Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio es el documento monumental y el maximo programa de la nacion que ha desarrollado como acuerdo comun de todos los coreanos la meta y los grandes principios de la reunificacion de la patria y los remedios para lograrla, comienza el texto y continua:
					
					Gracias al comienzo de la epoca del 15 de Junio, los compatriotas compartieron la fraternidad y se unieron por encima de los sufrimientos a causa de division y se realizaron activamente las visitas reciprocas, contactos, reuniones conjuntas y labores de cooperacion entre distintos sectores.
					
					Por culpa de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion, perdura durante 6 anos pasados la situacion anormal en que es negada abiertamente la declaracion intercoreana.
					
					Debido a los detractores de la era del 15 de Junio, se agravo la tension militar y quedaron suspendidos todos los proyectos por la reconciliacion, la unidad y la prosperidad comun de la nacion.
					
					La unica manera para eliminar la crisis de guerra y abrir nuevo horizonte de reconciliacion, cooperacion, paz y reunificacion esta en respetar y ejecutar esa declaracion.
					
					Todos los connacionales del Norte y el Sur de Corea y en ultramar deben abrir la segunda epoca del 15 de Junio uniendo las fuerzas entre los connacionales.
					
					Los comites norteno, sureno y ultramarino cumpliran con toda su responsabilidad y papel de organizacion pannacional del movimiento por la reunificacion para hacer de 2014, un ano antes del 70o aniversario de la liberacion de la patria, el ano de cambio trascendental para abrir la "segunda epoca del 15 de Junio".
					
					Toda la nacion coreana debe dedicar toda su inteligencia y esfuerzos por abrir la segunda epoca del 15 de Junio con el patriotismo, la voluntad de reunificacion y la conviccion de la victoria.
